item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 30th April
item.description:
I keep my horse on a very busy livery yard based in Noverton, and there are also many horses kept and ridden in the nearby area including the RDA horses. Many of us cross the busy main road coming out of either Shaw Green Lane or Gravel Pit Lane, and cross directly over the B4632 which is currently a 60mph road. It would be really helpful to us if a couple of warning signs could be placed for both directions of traffic to make drivers aware of horses crossing and being on the road. I would really appreciate it if you could point me in the right direction.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
